byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and JOHN ELIGON

abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg says he is trying to strike balance between protecting Occupy Wall Street protesters' right to free speech and needs of Lower Manhattan residents.
snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said he was trying to strike a balance between protecting protesters’ right to free speech and the needs of Lower Manhattan residents.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said he was trying to strike a balance between protecting protesters’ right to free speech and the needs of Lower Manhattan residents.

headline.main: Bloomberg Says ‘Tent City’ Goes Beyond Free Speech
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg Says ‘Tent City’ Goes Beyond Free Speech
headline.seo: Bloomberg Says ‘Tent City’ at Wall Street Protest Exceeds Free Speech
